cause.description:
WHO WE ARE:
Firefly is a charitable organization that funds research in neurodegenerative diseases in pursuit of one day finding a cure.
We also believe that the earlier you adopt a healthy brain routine, the better your chances are for having a healthy brain later in life.
For this reason, Firefly is dedicated to advancing brain health and inspiring all generations to take care of their brain every day.
OUR RESEARCH:
An important focus for Firefly funding is the pursuit of cures. Through the Center for Research in Neurodegenerative Diseases at the University of Toronto, we fund early-phase, proof-of-concept research with a focus on Alzheimer’s and Lewy body disease.
We also source and share scientific discoveries that connect a growing body of evidence which suggests lifestyle and behaviour can help prevent or prolong the onset of neurodegenerative disease later in life.
Both of these initiatives support a dedication to investing in ahead-of-the-curve ideas with the potential for truly breakthrough discoveries.
HELP BRAINS STAY BRIGHT: Currently there are no cures and few treatments for neurodegenerative diseases.
There are many ways for you to help fund important research and advance the cause:
• Commemorating someone through our online In Memoriam • Participating in our annual Mental Marathon • Donating your time or money to Firefly
Your brain - it’s a good cause.
For more information or tips on what you can do to help your brain last longer, visit our website.
